context: The Estonian word 'pääseme' is the 1st person plural present/future tense form of the verb 'pääsima', which means 'to arrive', 'to get to', or 'to reach'. It indicates that the speaker and others will be able to successfully arrive at a destination or achieve something. The word combines the root pääse- with the -me suffix indicating we (1st person plural) and has present/future tense aspect.
